name: Abhisek Chakrabarty
content: Abhisek Chakrabarty Abhisek Chakrabarty Researcher Advanced Translation Technology Laboratory (ATT) Advanced Speech Translation Research and Development Promotion center (ASTREC) National Institute of Information and Communications Technology (NICT) 3-5 Hikaridai, Seika-cho, Soraku-gun, Kyoto, 619-0289, Japan Email: abhisek0842@gmail.com, abhisek.chakra@nict.go.jp About Me: I am a researcher at ASTREC-ATT laboratory of NICT, Japan. The primary research theme of our laboratory is machine translation. My area of research is using morphological information to improve machine translation. Research Interests: Natural Language Processing, Deep Learning. Curriculum Vitae: Full CV Publication List: See my DBLP page.
